Brain.ParietalLobe

Class Shape

  • java.lang.Object
    • Brain.ParietalLobe.Shape
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Circle, Square, Triangle

    public abstract class Shape
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents an abstract class of a shape object.
    Version:
    5/15/2017

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Shape(double xCoord, double yCoord, double move, java.awt.Color c)
      Constructs an instance of a shape object

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract void act()
      Moves a shape object to the left by decreasing the x-values by a certain velocity.
      void changeColor() 
      abstract void draw(java.awt.Graphics g)
      Draws an instance of a type of shape object.
      abstract double getHeight() 
      abstract void moveWithWall(int x)
      Moves this shape with the wall by increasing or decreasing its y-coordinate, depending on the arrow key pressed.
      void setX(double xC) 
      void setY(double yC) 
      abstract int whichShape()
      Returns an integer determining the shape this is, out of a circle, square, or triangle depending on its order in the main array (constructed in the ParietalPanel class)

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Shape

        public Shape(double xCoord,
             double yCoord,
             double move,
             java.awt.Color c)
        Constructs an instance of a shape object
        Parameters:
        xCoord - the x-coordinate of the top left corner of the shape
        yCoord - the y-coordinate of the top left corner of the shape
        c - the color of the shape
        move - the amount the shape can move by

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public abstract void draw(java.awt.Graphics g)
        Draws an instance of a type of shape object.
        Parameters:
        g - the Graphics object used to draw this shape

      • act

        public abstract void act()
        Moves a shape object to the left by decreasing the x-values by a certain velocity.

      • moveWithWall

        public abstract void moveWithWall(int x)
        Moves this shape with the wall by increasing or decreasing its y-coordinate, depending on the arrow key pressed.
        Parameters:
        x - the integer that determines which arrow key is being pressed, a is greater than 0 if the up arrow key is pressed and a is less than 0 if the down arrow key is pressed

      • getHeight

        public abstract double getHeight()

      • whichShape

        public abstract int whichShape()
        Returns an integer determining the shape this is, out of a circle, square, or triangle depending on its order in the main array (constructed in the ParietalPanel class)
        Returns:
        the integer 0, 1, or 2 to determine its index in the array

      • setX

        public void setX(double xC)

      • setY

        public void setY(double yC)

      • changeColor

        public void changeColor()
